name: rocket-wars
description: browser-based game where players fire rockets at each other's base

scripts.check-file: sh -c 'f="$1"; if [ -z "$f" ]; then echo "Usage: npm run check-file -- <file.js>" >&2; exit 1; fi; echo Checking $f...; node --input-type=module -c < "$f"' --
scripts.check-files: sh -c 'for f in $(find src -type f -name "*.js" | sort); do echo Checking $f...; node --input-type=module -c < "$f" || echo Error in $f; done'

author: Phil George
